actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act by allowing duty-free treatment for certain footwear.

summary.text: Amends the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act to provide duty-free treatment for certain footwear that: (1) is the growth, product, manufacture of a Caribbean Basin Trade Partnership Act (CBTPA) beneficiary country; and (2) meets certain other requirements.

titles.title: To amend the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act by allowing duty-free treatment for certain footwear.
